attributes.comment: The biggest issue will be participation and accuracy of information. Hospitals and their administrative staff are already overwhelmed and understaffed. CMS could help bolster participation by creating an API that could be used/purchased/ that would allow easy upload of staff directories into the platform being created. As an incentive for participation hospitals and health systems could receive a one-time grant to continue to maintain accurate directories or purchase software that would help maintain current staff directories. Then, quarterly CMS could offer a nominal medicare reimbursement bonus as part of interoperability compliance to all who have maintained accurate staff directories.

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
